org.springframework.validation.beanvalidation

类 SpringConstraintValidatorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.validation.beanvalidation.SpringConstraintValidatorFactory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javax.validation.ConstraintValidatorFactory

    public class SpringConstraintValidatorFactory
extends Object
implements javax.validation.ConstraintValidatorFactory
    JSR-303 ConstraintValidatorFactory implementation that delegates to a Spring BeanFactory for creating autowired ConstraintValidator instances.

    Note that this class is meant for programmatic use, not for declarative use in a standard validation.xml file. Consider SpringWebConstraintValidatorFactory for declarative use in a web application, e.g. with JAX-RS or JAX-WS.

    从以下版本开始:
    3.0
    另请参阅:
    AutowireCapableBeanFactory.createBean(Class), ApplicationContext.getAutowireCapableBeanFactory()
